exercise_classification_overview.digital_adaptation_priority: High - all exercises designed for interactive digital implementation

exercises.name: Word-Picture Matching
exercises.description: Match Turkish words with corresponding images
exercises.example: Match 'elma' with apple image

exercises.name: Vocabulary Fill-in-the-Blank
exercises.description: Complete sentences with appropriate vocabulary
exercises.example: Ben her sabah _____ içerim. (çay/kahve)

exercises.name: Word Categorization
exercises.description: Sort words into appropriate categories
exercises.example: Sort foods into 'meyve' and 'sebze' categories

exercises.name: Definition Matching
exercises.description: Match words with their definitions or explanations
exercises.example: Match 'öğretmen' with 'okullarda ders veren kişi'

exercises.name: Interactive Crossword
exercises.description: Complete crossword puzzles with vocabulary clues
exercises.example: 5 across: 'Sabah içilen sıcak içecek' (çay)

exercises.name: Spaced Repetition Cards
exercises.description: Review vocabulary using spaced repetition algorithm
exercises.example: Show 'kitap' - choose correct translation

exercises.name: Verb Conjugation Practice
exercises.description: Practice conjugating verbs in different tenses and persons
exercises.example: Ben okul___ gidiyorum. (a/e)

exercises.name: Case Suffix Application
exercises.description: Apply correct case suffixes to nouns
exercises.example: Okul___ gidiyorum. (-a/-e/-da/-de)

exercises.name: Sentence Construction
exercises.description: Build grammatically correct sentences from given elements
exercises.example: Arrange: [ben, okula, gidiyorum, her, gün]

exercises.name: Error Identification and Correction
exercises.description: Find and correct grammatical errors in sentences
exercises.example: Ben okula gidiyorum. (Find the error)

exercises.name: Sentence Transformation
exercises.description: Transform sentences according to given instructions
exercises.example: Make negative: 'Ben okula gidiyorum.'

exercises.name: Reading Comprehension Questions
exercises.description: Answer questions based on reading passages
exercises.example: Read text about daily routine, answer 'What time does Ali wake up?'

exercises.name: True/False Statements
exercises.description: Determine if statements about the text are true or false
exercises.example: Ali sabah 7'de kalkıyor. (True/False)

exercises.name: Text Ordering
exercises.description: Arrange sentences or paragraphs in logical order
exercises.example: Order sentences to create a coherent story

exercises.name: Text Gap Filling
exercises.description: Fill gaps in text with appropriate words or phrases
exercises.example: Ali her sabah _____ kalkıyor ve _____ gidiyor.

exercises.name: Audio Comprehension Questions
exercises.description: Answer questions based on audio recordings
exercises.example: Listen to dialogue, answer 'Where is the conversation taking place?'

exercises.name: Dictation Exercise
exercises.description: Write down what you hear in the audio
exercises.example: Listen and write: 'Ben her gün okula gidiyorum.'

exercises.name: Audio-Visual Matching
exercises.description: Match audio clips with corresponding images or text
exercises.example: Match audio of 'elma' with apple image

exercises.name: Pronunciation Practice
exercises.description: Listen and repeat words or phrases for pronunciation practice
exercises.example: Listen to 'merhaba' and repeat with correct pronunciation

exercises.name: Guided Writing
exercises.description: Write sentences or paragraphs with guided prompts
exercises.example: Write about your daily routine using given time expressions

exercises.name: Form Filling
exercises.description: Complete forms with personal or fictional information
exercises.example: Fill out a school registration form

exercises.name: Creative Writing
exercises.description: Write creative texts based on prompts or images
exercises.example: Write a short story about a day in Istanbul

exercises.name: Interactive Dialogue
exercises.description: Participate in simulated conversations
exercises.example: Role-play ordering food in a restaurant

exercises.name: Mini Presentations
exercises.description: Give short presentations on given topics
exercises.example: Present your family to the class

technical_requirements.accessibility: Screen reader support and keyboard navigation

gamification_elements.points_system: Points awarded for correct answers and completion
gamification_elements.badges: Achievement badges for milestones and perfect scores
gamification_elements.leaderboards: Class or global leaderboards for motivation
gamification_elements.streaks: Daily practice streaks and consistency rewards
gamification_elements.levels: Progressive difficulty levels with unlockable content

adaptive_features.difficulty_adjustment: Automatic difficulty adjustment based on performance
adaptive_features.personalized_practice: Customized exercise selection based on weak areas
adaptive_features.spaced_repetition: Intelligent review scheduling for long-term retention
adaptive_features.learning_paths: Multiple pathways through content based on learning style

assessment_integration.diagnostic_feedback: Detailed analysis of errors and improvement suggestions
assessment_integration.portfolio_building: Collection of student work for progress demonstration
assessment_integration.competency_tracking: Skill-based progress tracking aligned with CEFR standards
